comments.author: Henry Ho
comments.message: What time? and in which timezone? thanks.

comments.author: Akbarsait
comments.message:
@Henry,

The meeting is on IST time zone between 3:30 - 4:30 PM Indian Standard Time. You can check the time of the meeting in your time zone here -  http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?month=10&day=22&year=2009&hour=15&min=30&sec=0&p1=553
